```{r}
result <- c()
  for(cell_type in unique(Mm_seurat@meta.data$cell_ontology_class)){
    Mm_seurat@meta.data %>%
      dplyr::filter(cell_ontology_class == cell_type) %>%
      nrow -> n.cell_type

    if(n.cell_type > 200){
      Mm_seurat@meta.data %>%
        dplyr::filter(cell_ontology_class == cell_type) %>%
        slice_sample(n=200) %>%
        rownames %>%
        c(result, .) -> result
    }else{
      Mm_seurat@meta.data %>%
        dplyr::filter(cell_ontology_class == cell_type) %>%
        rownames %>%
        c(result, .) -> result
    }

```
